casebody.data:
NC NAACP
v.
MOORE, et al. 261P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 29, 2018 Kimberley Hunter, David L. Neal, Mary MacLean Asbill, Brooks Rainey Pearson, Irving Joyner, Durham, Daryl V. Atkinson, Leah J. Kang, Attorneys at Law, for NC NAACP D. Martin Warf, Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Moore, Tim, et al. Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina Professors of Constitutional Law

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2018 by Plaintiff to Bypass Court of Appeals:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of August 2018."
